name: Measuring Taylor's anxiety level
interpretation: total score: 40 – 50 points is considered as the indication of a very high level of anxiety, 25 – 40 points indicates a high level of anxiety, 15 – 25 points on average (with a tendency to high) level 5 – 15 points on average (with a tendency to low) level 0 – 5 points - a low level of anxiety.

questions.question: I'm usually calm and it's not easy to lose my temper
My nerves are no more upset than other people's
I rarely have constipation
I rarely have headaches
I rarely get tired
I almost always feel quite happy
I 'm confident in myself
Practically I never blush
Compared to my friends, I consider myself quite a brave person
I don't blush more often than others
I rarely have a heartbeat
My hands are usually quite warm
I am no more shy than others
I don't have enough confidence in myself
Sometimes I feel like I'm good for nothing
I have periods of such anxiety that I can't sit still
My stomach bothers me a lot
I don't have the courage to face all the challenges ahead
I would like to be as happy as others
Sometimes it seems to me that I have such difficulties piled up in front of me that I cannot overcome
I often have bad dreams
I notice that my hands start shaking when I try to do something
I have extremely restless and intermittent sleep
I am very concerned about possible failures
I had to experience fear in those cases when I knew for sure that nothing was threatening me
I find it difficult to focus on my work or any task
I work very hard
I get confused easily
I feel anxious about someone or something almost all the time
I tend to take everything too seriously
I often cry
I often suffer from bouts of vomiting and nausea
Once a month or more, I get an upset stomach
I'm often afraid that I'm going to blush
I find it very difficult to focus on anything
My financial situation is very worrying for me
I often think about things that I don't want to talk about with anyone
I've had periods when anxiety kept me awake
At times, when I'm confused, I get a lot of sweating, which is very confusing for me
Even on cold days, I sweat easily
Sometimes I get so excited that I find it hard to fall asleep
I am an easily excitable person
Sometimes I feel completely useless
Sometimes I think that my nerves are very shaky and I'm about to lose my temper
I often find myself worrying about something
I'm much more sensitive than most other people
I feel hungry almost all the time
Sometimes I get upset over nothing
Life for me is connected with unusual tension
Waiting always makes me nervous
